Reviews.Title: Very good video editing laptop
Reviews.Author: GauloisUSA
Reviews.Content: I purchased the MSI GP60 for video editing purpose. I wasn't sure if a gaming machine would fit the bill. but I went for it.First of all, the packaging was extremely nice.Then, I found out there is very little bloatware coming with this MSI laptop, so cleaning before use was a breeze.I find the plastic color and feel of this laptop to be very agreeable.The keyboard is practicable and pleasing to the touch.Now for the hardware.The sound coming out of its 2 front mounted speakers is powerful, but I had nothing in the past to refer to, so I can not comment on its validity as a gaming machine.IT IS SUPER FAST. On my last laptop, one of my editing software took 180 minutes (3hr) to render. The GP60 does it 10x faster. I almost fail out of my chair when it completed the job in only 15 minutes.DVD and sd card slot worked as expected.The screen seams a bit washed out. But it might be set for gaming.After only a few days working around the clock to set up this laptop to my needs, as you can tell, I am extremely impressed by it, but time will tell if it's reliable. So I will keep updating my review.

Reviews.Title: Best $1000 i ever spent on a latptop!
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: This laptops I knew from the minute I purchased it, I was going to be very pleased. It runs games like a charm, games like ( BF4 , rust ... and especially minecraft) so if your deciding to get this laptop, you have made the right choice.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7-4700HQ 3.2GHz to 3.4GHz w/ Turbo Boost
8 GB DDR3L SDRAM
750 GB 7200 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen; NVIDIA Geforce GT840M with 2GB GDDR3 VRAM
Windows 8.1
ProductInfo.Name: MSI Computer Corp. GP60 LEOPARD-009 15.6-Inch Laptop
